channel.title: How can i make safe zones
channel.description:
in my server like everywhere is wildy, except the banks and most houses i think are safe, but i wanna make it so only the places that are supposed to be wild, be wild. what i mean is i want the cities safe, varrock edgeville and fally and all other cities
*EDIT* i do not have "safezone" or "nonwild" in my client.java.

item.title: How can i make safe zones
item.dc:creator: @darkman210 darkman210
item.description:
@darkman210 wrote:

[quote=“PatScape, post:2, topic:150161”]Wow, possibly the most useless post I’ve ever seen mammoth. Don’t be a smartass.

You have to search in your client for

public boolean nonWild() {

Then there will be a list of coords. They are as follows:

(absX >= ###1  && absX <= ###2 && absY >= ###3  && absY <= ###4 )

###1 = The X coords of the most south west corner of the ‘nonwild box’
###2 = The X coords of the most north east corner of the ‘nonwild box’
###3 = The Y coords of the most south west corner of the ‘nonwild box’
###4 = The Y coords of the most north east corner of the ‘nonwild box’
Here is a small diagram of the ‘box’
|---------X2,Y2
|--------- |
|--------- |
X1, Y1----------|
My ascii art sucks. But you take the coords of those two locations and it creates the area of non wild.[/quote]

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make safe zones
